Package bg.x2d.anim

Interface Summary
Animator Defines a standard for animation engines inside and outside of the 2DX library.
Note: Java 5.0 or higher required as the java.util.concurrent class is utilized.
Drawable A Drawable is an object that defines a specific image to be drawn with each call to its draw(Graphics2D) method.
Segment Defines methods for Segments of an Animation.
 

Class Summary
Animation A collection of Segments that perform operations on a Graphics object's transform to create timed animation effects.
ComboSegment  
CurveSegment  
DilationSegment Segment that scales the AffineTransform of this Graphics object based on x,y scale factors, time duration and size of the canvas being draw upon (optional).
GTDEngine The base GTD animation engine provided by the 2DX library.
RotationSegment Segment that rotates the AffineTransform a specified number of degrees, over a specified amount of time and around an optional anchor point.
Transform Holds data used by Segments when running in an ongoing animation.
TranslationSegment Segment that translates the AffineTransform the specified amounts on the x and y axes for the specified amount of time.
 

Exception Summary
AnimException
